mapper.insert: insert into sea_temp (v_id, tid, v_name, v_state, v_pic, v_actor, v_publishyear, v_publisharea, v_addtime, v_note, v_letter, v_director, v_enname, v_lang, v_playdata, v_des) values (#{vId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tid,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{vName,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{vState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{vPic,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{vActor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vPublishyear,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{vPublisharea,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{vAddtime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{vNote,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{vLetter,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{vDirector,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vEnname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vLang,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vPlaydata,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{vDes,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update sea_temp set tid = #{tid,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, v_name = #{vName,jdbcType=CHAR}, v_state = #{vState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, v_pic = #{vPic,jdbcType=CHAR}, v_actor = #{vActor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, v_publishyear = #{vPublishyear,jdbcType=CHAR}, v_publisharea = #{vPublisharea,jdbcType=CHAR}, v_addtime = #{vAddtime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, v_note = #{vNote,jdbcType=CHAR}, v_letter = #{vLetter,jdbcType=CHAR}, v_director = #{vDirector,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, v_enname = #{vEnname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, v_lang = #{vLang,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, v_playdata = #{vPlaydata,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, v_des = #{vDes,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where v_id = #{vId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select v_id, tid, v_name, v_state, v_pic, v_actor, v_publishyear, v_publisharea, v_addtime, v_note, v_letter, v_director, v_enname, v_lang, v_playdata, v_des from sea_temp where v_id = #{vId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select v_id, tid, v_name, v_state, v_pic, v_actor, v_publishyear, v_publisharea, v_addtime, v_note, v_letter, v_director, v_enname, v_lang, v_playdata, v_des from sea_temp
